# Overview
- As a [user concerned by the story]
- I want [goal of the story]
- so that [reason for the story]

## Acceptance criteria

1. [If I do A.]
1. [B should happen.]

## Constraints

1. Constraint 1;
1. Constraint 2;
1. Constraint 3.
